title: Forged in Battle: Man at Arms v1.7.7 and mod
description:
Like an ingot of iron, you will be... FORGED IN BATTLE.

Make different cold weapons in your smithy. Use the weapon in battles against crowds of monsters and demons. Fight the Dark Lord and his army in this game for Android. Try to forge sharp swords and other weapons. The process of creating each weapon is an exciting mini-game. Guide a brave hero armed with your weapons through a lot of gloomy locations filled with numerous enemies. Use unique military skills of the hero, chop enemies, and defeat bosses.

Â· Hone your forging abilities with five mini-games that make you feel like a true swordsmith
Â· With your forged weapons, battle Lord Vandharâ€™s evil forces
Â· Unleash apocalyptic battalion attacks to decimate your enemies
Â· Gather resources throughout five unique battlefields and later use for improving your weaponsâ€™ effectiveness
Â· Forged in Battle: Man at Arms is based on the hit web series, Man at Arms: Reforged

Great selection of weapons
5 different locations
Strong opponents
Dynamic battles
You own smithy

Requires Android OS 2.3.3 and up
